Package pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.model

Class Hand

java.lang.Object
pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.model.Hand
public class Hand extends Object
Class representing a player's hand in the game. A hand consists of a list of cards and is associated with a hand rank (the strength of the hand). This class provides methods to add or remove cards, exchange cards, and retrieve the hand's cards and rank.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Hand()
    Constructs an empty hand.
    Hand(List<Card> initialCards)
    Constructs a hand with an initial set of cards.

  • Constructor Details

    • Hand

      public Hand()
      Constructs an empty hand. Initializes the hand with no cards.

    • Hand

      public Hand(List<Card> initialCards)
      Constructs a hand with an initial set of cards.
      Parameters:
      initialCards - The list of cards to initialize the hand with.

  • Method Details

    • addCard

      public void addCard(Card card)
      Adds a card to the hand.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to be added to the hand.

    • removeCard

      public Card removeCard(int index)
      Removes a card from the hand at the specified index. Returns the removed card, or null if the index is invalid.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the card to be removed.
      Returns:
      The removed card, or null if the index is invalid.

    • getCards

      public List<Card> getCards()
      Returns a new list containing the cards in the hand. The returned list is a copy to ensure the original hand is not modified.
      Returns:
      A list of cards in the hand.

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns the number of cards in the hand.
      Returns:
      The size of the hand.

    • exchangeCard

      public boolean exchangeCard(int index, Deck deck)
      Exchanges a card in the hand with a new random card from the provided deck. The card at the specified index is removed and replaced with a new card.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the card to be exchanged.
      deck - The deck to draw the new card from.
      Returns:
      true if the exchange was successful, false if the index is invalid or the deck is empty.

    • getHandRank

      public HandRank getHandRank()
      Returns the current hand rank (the strength of the hand).
      Returns:
      The hand's rank.

    • setHandRank

      public void setHandRank(HandRank handRank)
      Sets the hand's rank (the strength of the hand).
      Parameters:
      handRank - The rank to set for the hand.
